[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546ac5dd63687251a80f0000#post_546ac5dd63687251a80f0000
Nothing can defeat Jotaro. Most of Part 4 and 6 was figuring out how to get him out of comission becauses his Stand is super broken.[/bq]

Dio managed to defeat Jotaro several times. And yeah, it's usually at the beginning when he's not that powerful but c'mon, let's be honest, Jotaro's stand tends to be what the plot needs it to be 8/10 times.
